name: Rolling Ball (S. Benjamin Phillips)
description:
This is a simple game where the player controls a ball and tries to avoid obstacles and gain points by collecting yellow cubes. There are also two power-ups that respawn, one that makes the ball faster and one that makes the ball bigger. The enlargement power-up also has a secret effect that has to do with the red boxes.

All sounds are from FreeSound.org.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Brake

Year of production: Fall 2015
